about_the_game:
Aurye Clicker – Click, Combine, and Conquer the Power of the Auryes!

Discover a universe where alchemy, occultism, and strategy converge. In Aurye Clicker, your goal is simple yet addictive: collect all the Auryes, creatures made of pure aura, as you explore a world where cosmic alignments shape the balance of the universe.

A Journey of Collection and Evolution

The Auryes range from Inferior Auryes to the majestic and powerful Cosmic Auryes. Each creature belongs to one of the four alignments of entities, each with a unique role in the universal cycle:

  • Psychlis: The guardians of the cycle, responsible for maintaining the natural flow between beginnings and endings.

  • Oblivion: The agents of change and renewal, bringing transformation and fresh starts to the world.

  • Nexus: The agents of order and consistency, protectors of balance and stability.

  • Vortex: The agents of annihilation, relentless forces that symbolize the inevitable end.

These alignments, combined with the categories of Auryes, create a total of 128 unique combinations for you to collect, combine, and master.

Addictive and Versatile Mechanics

🖱️ Attack and Collect: Each click or mouse movement deals damage to the cards. When defeated, the Auryes become part of your collection.

🕒 Idle and Clicker: Play actively by clicking to progress quickly, or let the game run in the background to accumulate cards passively.

✨ Evolve and Combine: Combine Auryes to unlock rarer and more powerful forms.

💱 Trade and Exchange: Use the Steam Community Market to buy and sell cards, or trade directly with friends to complete your collection.

Unique Art and Immersive Atmosphere

🖋️ Hand-Drawn Visuals: Everything in the game is crafted with pencil and paper, creating a unique and engaging artistic style.

🔮 A World Inspired by the Occult: Discover the power of alignments, the mysteries of alchemy, and the enigma of cosmic entities.

Key Features

🌟 128 Unique Auryes: Explore amazing combinations of categories and alignments.

🕹️ Play Your Way: Mouse, keyboard, or controller – the choice is yours.

🏆 From Inferior to Cosmic: Start with the most basic Auryes and work your way to the most powerful entities in the universe.

Are you ready to conquer the world of the Auryes and uncover all their secrets?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 ou superior (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 ou AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 ou equivalente (com suporte a OpenGL 3.3+)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 ou superior (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 ou AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 ou AMD Radeon R7 370 (ou equivalentes com suporte a Vulkan)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Aurye Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible.
